Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class contains the Manager for the database of the program. All database manipulation will be done through this class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Connection
    connection
    Connection object for connecting to database.
    private static DatabaseManager
    manager
    Database object for use of singleton pattern.
    private int
    rowsAffected
    Integer value to retrieve total rows edited from database.
    private Statement
    statement
    Statement object to query statements to database.

    • signIn

      public void signIn(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      This method signs the user into the database.
      Parameters:
      username - Sign in username
      password - Sign in password
      Throws:
      SQLException - Failed to sign in. Username or password incorrect.

    • retrieveProjects

      Returns:

    • addProject

      public void addProject(String number, String name, String buildingType, String Address, float totalFees, float paidToDate, String deadline, String completionDate, String contractor, String architect, String customer)
      This method adds a new project to the projects table in the database.
      Parameters:
      number - Project number
      name - Project name
      buildingType - Project building type
      Address - Project address
      totalFees - Project total fees
      paidToDate - Project total paid to date
      deadline - Project deadline
      completionDate - Project completion date
      contractor - Project contractor name
      architect - Project architect name
      customer - Project Customer name

      number - Number of project to edit
      column - Column off value to change
      newValue - New value to set column to
